manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
- Quicksnap has been enabled (not functional yet, long-press the Direct icon to try it out).
- New bubble-style layout added for story comments.
- Discovery grid refreshed with a cleaner look.
- Gallery half-sheet introduced in Direct for easier access.
- Low light mode capture is now supported.
- Repost button included in the sharesheet.
- Stories now support 2x speed playback.
- Story music duration extended to 60 seconds.
- Inbox layout simplified for a smoother experience.
- Old "Write with Meta AI" layout has been restored.
- Avatars have been removed from comments.
- Reels watch and comment features are temporarily disabled.
- Repost experience has been improved.
- Stories AI edit feature updated.
- Old flags have been refreshed.
- Minor bugs have been fixed.
manifest.name: Zain's Backup
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
